original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business requirements and technical implementation, blending strategic thinking with hands-on system configuration expertise. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective system configurations, and driving continuous improvement through data analysis and process optimization. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, communicate technical details to non-technical stakeholders, and leverage cutting-edge technologies like machine learning and artificial intelligence will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at peak efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively bridge the gap between business and technical stakeholders
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to develop and maintain system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovative solutions and process improvements
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies to support iterative development and continuous delivery
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and systems to provide domain-specific expertise

Required Experience:
- 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis, system configuration, and data analysis
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical solutions
- Experience working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with cross-functional teams

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration or related industry, providing a deeper understanding of the domain
- Familiarity with Agile project management frameworks and tools to enhance process efficiency

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL-based databases and reporting/visualization tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement
- Agile development methodology, with a emphasis on iterative delivery and rapid iteration
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and best practices
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to meet project deadlines

Role Overview:
This role is a crucial link between business strategy and technical implementation, responsible for translating complex organizational requirements into effective system configurations. As a technical business analyst, you will be a key player in ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the evolving needs of the business and operates at peak efficiency. By blending your strong business acumen with hands-on technical proficiency, you will drive continuous improvement through data-driven insights and process optimization. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, communicate complex information to non-technical stakeholders, and leverage cutting-edge technologies will be instrumental in delivering innovative solutions that support the organization's strategic objectives.

Key Responsibilities:
- Partner with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, understand complex processes, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, collaborating with cross-functional teams during user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Serve as a technical liaison between business stakeholders, developers, IT support, and other team members to facilitate smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively bridge the gap between business and technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Expertise in Java and SQL programming to develop and maintain system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovative solutions and process improvements
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies to support iterative development and continuous delivery
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and systems to provide domain-specific expertise

Required Experience:
- 5+ years of experience in a role that combines business analysis, system configuration, and data-driven decision making
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into effective technical solutions
- Experience working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with cross-functional teams

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration or related industry, providing a deeper understanding of the domain
- Familiarity with Agile project management frameworks and tools to enhance process efficiency

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL-based databases and advanced reporting/visualization tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Agile development methodology, with a emphasis on iterative delivery and rapid iteration
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and best practices
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to meet project deadlines and drive organizational objectives

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic bridge between business needs and technical implementation, responsible for ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the evolving requirements of the organization and operates at optimal efficiency. As a technical business analyst, you will be a key player in driving continuous improvement through data-driven insights and process optimization. By blending your strong business acumen with hands-on technical proficiency, you will collaborate cross-functionally to translate complex organizational needs into effective system configurations. Your ability to communicate complex information to non-technical stakeholders, leverage cutting-edge technologies like machine learning and artificial intelligence, and deliver innovative solutions will be instrumental in supporting the organization's strategic objectives.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document complex processes using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure a clear understanding of organizational needs
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing advanced tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, leveraging machine learning and artificial intelligence where applicable
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, collaborating with cross-functional teams during user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Serve as a technical liaison between business stakeholders, developers, IT support, and other team members to facilitate smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Outstanding communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively bridge the gap between business and technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Expertise in Java and SQL programming to develop and maintain system configurations
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their application in driving innovative solutions and process improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Agile methodologies to support iterative development and continuous delivery
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and systems to provide domain-specific expertise

Required Experience:
- 7+ years of experience in a role that combines business analysis, system configuration, and data-driven decision making
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into effective technical solutions that drive organizational objectives
- Experience working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with cross-functional teams

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration or related industry, providing a deeper understanding of the domain
- Familiarity with Agile project management frameworks and tools to enhance process efficiency

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- SQL-based databases and advanced reporting/visualization tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Agile development methodology, with a emphasis on iterative delivery and rapid iteration
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and best practices
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to meet project deadlines and drive strategic objectives
